articles.title: Q1 results today: Bharti Airtel, ONGC, Marico among companies to post earnings; check list - Upstox
articles.description: Q1 results today: Tata Chemicals, Paras Defence and Space Technologies, Brigade Enterprises, Deepak Nitrite, Devyani International, Hawkins Cookers, Reliance Home Finance, TajGVK Hotels and Tribhovandas Bhimji Zaveri will also announce their Q1 results today.

articles.title: New Strategies To Combat Dementia: 14 Risk Factors You Can Control - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The 2024 Lancet Commission report identifies vision loss and high cholesterol as new risk factors for dementia, adding to 12 others previously known. It emphasizes the importance of early and lifelong management of these factors, including for those with a ge…
articles.content:

A new report indicates that tackling 14 lifestyle and environmental risk factors from an early age could prevent almost 50% of dementia cases globally. Highlighting new ri… [+13055 chars]

articles.author: Daniel Patrascu
articles.title: Hot Burning Rocket Engines Could Turn the Moon's Surface Into Instant Landing Pads - autoevolution
articles.description: The Plume Additive for Reducing Surface Ejecta and Cratering (PARSEC) is a tech meant to reduce the amount of regolith debris thrown up during Moon landings
articles.content: Every single inch of the lunar surface is covered by a thick layer of charcoal-gray dust we call regolith. It is the result of asteroids, meteoroids, and comets hammering the surface of the Moon for … [+4598 chars]
